file_insights.description: Detailed experiment report for RunningStat fusion benchmarks
Rust benchmark implementation for comparing statistics computation approaches

patterns_discovered: Performance comparison of single-pass vs multi-pass statistical computation
Using Welford's algorithm for numerically stable rolling statistics

discoveries.approach_outcome: SUCCESS - Completed experimental benchmark setup for comparing RunningStat computation strategies
recommendations: Consider adopting fused kernel if performance tests validate hypothesis
